description: Detects known sensitive file extensions accessed on a network share
false_positives: Help Desk operator doing backup or re-imaging end user machine or backup software
Users working with these data types or exchanging message files
name: Suspicious Access to Sensitive File Extensions
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"5145" AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:(*.pst OR *.ost OR *.msg OR *.nst OR *.oab OR *.edb OR *.nsf OR *.bak OR *.dmp OR *.kirbi OR *\\groups.xml OR *.rdp))
author: Samir Bousseaden
